mapper.select: SELECT users.id itongjiId, users.mobile itongjimobile, ldcusers.id ldcId, ldcusers.mobile ldcMobile from users inner join ldc_users ldcusers on users.mobile = ldcusers.mobile where users.mobile is not null and users.mobile != '' and ldcusers.mobile is not null and ldcusers.mobile != ''

SELECT ldcUsers.id ldcId from ldc_users ldcUsers where ldcUsers.mobile not in ( SELECT DISTINCT users.mobile from users where users.mobile is not null and users.mobile != '' ) and ldcUsers.mobile != '' and ldcUsers.mobile is not null
mapper.update: update ldc_course_vip set vip_id = #{itongjiId} where vip_id = #{ldcId}
mapper.select: SELECT id from ldc_users where mobile = '' or mobile is null
SELECT id from users where mobile = '' or mobile is null

SELECT users.id itongjiId, ldcusers.id ldcId from users inner join ldc_users ldcusers on users.wx_sp_user_session_key = ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key and users.third_site_open_id = ldcusers.third_site_open_id and users.third_site_user_id = ldcusers.third_site_user_id where (users.mobile is null or users.mobile = '') and (ldcusers.mobile is null or ldcusers.mobile = '')

SELECT ldcusers.id ldcId from users inner join ldc_users ldcusers on users.third_site_open_id = ldcusers.third_site_open_id and users.third_site_user_id = ldcusers.third_site_user_id where (users.mobile is null or users.mobile = '') and (ldcusers.mobile is null or ldcusers.mobile = '') and users.wx_sp_user_session_key is NULL and ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key is null

SELECT ldcusers.id ldcId from users inner join ldc_users ldcusers on users.wx_sp_user_session_key = ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key
and users.third_site_user_id = ldcusers.third_site_user_id where (users.mobile is null or users.mobile = '') and (ldcusers.mobile is null or ldcusers.mobile = '') and users.third_site_open_id is NULL and ldcusers.third_site_open_id is null

SELECT ldcusers.id ldcId from users inner join ldc_users ldcusers on users.wx_sp_user_session_key = ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key and users.third_site_open_id = ldcusers.third_site_open_id where (users.mobile is null or users.mobile = '') and (ldcusers.mobile is null or ldcusers.mobile = '') and users.third_site_user_id is NULL and ldcusers.third_site_user_id is null

SELECT ldcusers.id id from ldc_users ldcusers where (ldcusers.mobile is null or ldcusers.mobile = '') and ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key is null and ldcusers.third_site_user_id is null and ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key is null

SELECT ldcusers.id id, ldcusers.true_name trueName from users ldcusers where (ldcusers.mobile is null or ldcusers.mobile = '') and ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key is null and ldcusers.third_site_user_id is null and ldcusers.wx_sp_user_session_key is null
